trans-unit.source: Indicates which condition should cause a Windows Forms application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Indica la condizione che deve provocare l'arresto di un'applicazione Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: You can set the shutdown mode for an application through the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare la modalità di chiusura di un'applicazione tramite il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> method checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A> property to determine if the application should shut down.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>metodo controlla il valore di <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A>proprietà per determinare se l'applicazione deve essere chiuso.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Shut down only after the last form closes.
trans-unit.target: Arrestato solo dopo la chiusura dell'ultimo form.

trans-unit.source: Shut down when the main form closes.
trans-unit.target: Arrestare alla chiusura del form principale.
